languages.text: Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by Voice of Command remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by Voice of Command but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: The target of Lasting Impression does not count as having the voice of command effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
languages.original_text: Половина {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонуса{/g} от Приказа командира сохраняется до конца боя. Этот бонус не суммируется сам с собой и с другими бонусами от Приказа командира, но считается эффектом от {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g} при расчете эффектов других {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантов{/g}. Примечание: Цель Мощного влияния не считается эффектом "приказ командира", а только получает бонусы к {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Half of the bonus granted by the Voice of Command remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by Voice of Command but counts as an effect of the Leader's ability for all other talents.

Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by Voice of Command remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by Voice of Command but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: The target of Lasting Impression does not count as having the voice of command effect. They only gain bonuses to their characteristics.

Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by Voice of Command remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by Voice of Command but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: The target of Lasting Impression does not count as having the voice of command effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by Voice of Command remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by Voice of Command but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: The target of Lasting Impression does not count as having the voice of command effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

languages.text: Половина {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонуса{/g} от Приказа командира сохраняется до конца боя. Этот бонус не суммируется сам с собой и с другими бонусами от Приказа командира, но считается эффектом от {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g} при расчете эффектов других {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантов{/g}. Примечание: Цель Мощного влияния не считается эффектом "приказ командира", а только получает бонусы к {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}.
languages.original_text: Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by Voice of Command remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by Voice of Command but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: The target of Lasting Impression does not count as having the voice of command effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Половина бонуса от Приказа командира сохраняется до конца боя. Этот бонус не суммируется сам с собой и с другими бонусами от Приказа командира, но считается эффектом от способности лидера при расчете эффектов других талантов.

Половина бонуса от Приказа командира сохраняется до конца боя. Этот бонус не суммируется сам с собой и с другими бонусами от Приказа командира, но считается эффектом от способности лидера при расчете эффектов других талантов.

languages.text: 指挥之声带来的一半的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}不会消失，会始终保持到战斗结束为止。此加值无法与自身或指挥之声赋予的加值叠加，但在其他{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}效果的计算过程中，会被视为{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的效果。 注：受持久印象影响的目标只获得“指挥之声”带来的{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}加值，不视为受“指挥之声”效果影响。
languages.original_text: Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by Voice of Command remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by Voice of Command but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: The target of Lasting Impression does not count as having the voice of command effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 指挥之声带来的一半的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}不会消失，会始终保持到战斗结束为止。此加值无法与自身或指挥之声赋予的加值叠加，但在其他{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}效果的计算过程中，会被视为{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的效果。 注：受持久印象影响的目标只获得“指挥之声”带来的{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}加值，不视为受“指挥之声”效果影响。

指挥之声带来的一半的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}不会消失，会始终保持到战斗结束为止。此加值无法与自身或指挥之声赋予的加值叠加，但在其他{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}效果的计算过程中，会被视为{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的效果。 注：受持久印象影响的目标只获得指挥之声带来的加值，不视为受指挥之声效果影响。

languages.text: La mitad de las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} otorgadas por Voz de mando permanecen en vigor hasta el final del combate. Esta bonificación no se acumula consigo misma ni con otras bonificaciones conferidas por Voz de mando, pero sí cuenta como efecto de una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} en lo que respecta a los efectos de otros {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g}. Nota: El objetivo de Impresión duradera no cuenta como bajo los efectos de Voz de mando, sino que solo recibe bonificaciones a sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}.
languages.original_text: Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by Voice of Command remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by Voice of Command but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: The target of Lasting Impression does not count as having the voice of command effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La mitad de las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} otorgadas por Voz de mando permanecen en vigor hasta el final del combate. Esta bonificación no se acumula consigo misma ni con otras bonificaciones conferidas por Voz de mando, pero sí cuenta como efecto de una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} en lo que respecta a los efectos de otros {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g}. Nota: El objetivo de Impresión duradera no cuenta como bajo los efectos de Voz de mando, sino que solo recibe bonificaciones a sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}.

La mitad de las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} otorgadas por Voz de mando permanecen en vigor hasta el final del combate. Esta bonificación no se acumula consigo misma ni con otras bonificaciones conferidas por Voz de mando, pero sí cuenta como efecto de una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} en lo que respecta a los efectos de otros {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g}. Nota: El objetivo de Impresión duradera no cuenta como efecto de Voz de mando, sino que solo recibe bonificaciones a sus características.

languages.text: Die Hälfte des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}, der durch Stimme des Kommandos gewährt wird, bleibt bis zum Ende des Kampfes erhalten. Dieser Bonus ist nicht mit sich selbst oder mit Boni stapelbar, die durch Stimme des Kommandos gewährt werden, zählt aber für die Zwecke anderer {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g}-Effekte als {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offiziers{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}. Hinweis: Das Ziel von Bleibender Eindruck zählt nicht als Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos, sondern erhält nur Boni auf seine Eigenschaften.
languages.original_text: Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by Voice of Command remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by Voice of Command but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: The target of Lasting Impression does not count as having the voice of command effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Hälfte des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}, der durch die Stimme des Kommandos gewährt wird, bleibt bis zum Ende des Kampfes erhalten. Dieser Bonus stapelt sich nicht mit sich selbst oder mit Boni, die durch Stimme des Kommandos gewährt werden, zählt aber für die Zwecke anderer {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g}-Effekte als eine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offiziers{/g}. Hinweis: Das Ziel von Bleibender Eindruck gilt nicht als mit dem Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos belegt. Es erhält nur Boni auf seine {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}.

Die Hälfte des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}, der durch Stimme des Kommandos gewährt wird, bleibt bis zum Ende des Kampfes erhalten. Dieser Bonus stacked nicht mit sich selbst oder mit Boni, die durch Stimme des Kommandos gewährt werden, zählt aber für die Zwecke anderer {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g}-Effekte als {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offiziers{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}. Hinweis: Das Ziel von Bleibender Eindruck zählt nicht als Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos, sondern erhält nur Boni auf seine Eigenschaften.

languages.text: La moitié du {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} conféré par Voix du commandement perdure jusqu'à la fin du combat. Ce bonus n'est pas cumulable avec lui-même ni avec les bonus octroyés par Voix du commandement, mais il compte comme un effet de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} pour les besoins des autres effets de {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}. Remarque : la cible d'Impression durable n'est pas considérée comme bénéficiaire de l'effet de Voix du commandement et obtient uniquement les bonus à ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g}.
languages.original_text: Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by Voice of Command remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by Voice of Command but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: The target of Lasting Impression does not count as having the voice of command effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La moitié du {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} conféré par Voix du commandement perdure jusqu'à la fin du combat. Ce bonus n'est pas cumulable avec lui-même ni avec les bonus octroyés par Voix du commandement, mais il compte comme un effet de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} pour les besoins des autres effets de {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}. Remarque : la cible d'Impression durable n'est pas considérée comme bénéficiaire de l'effet de Voix du commandement et obtient uniquement les bonus à ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g}.

La moitié du {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} conféré par Voix du Commandement reste en vigueur jusqu'à la fin du combat. Ce bonus n'est pas cumulable avec lui-même ou avec les bonus conférés par Voix du Commandement, mais il est comptabilisé comme un effet de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officier{/g} pour les besoins des autres effets des {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}. Remarque : La cible de Impression durable ne compte pas comme effet de Voix du Commandement, mais ne gagne que les bonus à ses caractéristiques.

La moitié du {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} conféré par Voix du commandement perdure jusqu'à la fin du combat. Ce bonus n'est pas cumulable avec lui-même ni avec les bonus octroyés par Voix du commandement, mais il compte comme un effet de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} pour les besoins des autres effets de {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}. Remarque : la cible d'Impression durable n'est pas considérée comme bénéficiaire de l'effet de Voix du commandement et obtient uniquement les bonus à ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g}.

languages.text: 指揮の声によって与えられる{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の半分は、戦闘終了まで持続する。このボーナスは、自分で得られる他の指揮の声ボーナスや同様の効果とは重複しないが、他の{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}効果においては{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}オフィサー{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}として扱われる。 メモ：持続する感銘の対象は指揮の声の効果を持つと見なされず、{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に対するボーナスのみを得る。
languages.original_text: Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by Voice of Command remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by Voice of Command but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: The target of Lasting Impression does not count as having the voice of command effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 指揮の声によって与えられた{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の半分が、戦闘終了まで持続する。このボーナスはそれ自体や指揮の声によって与えられたものと累積しないが、他の{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}の効果に必要なリーダーの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}にはカウントされる。

languages.text: Emir Sözü kabiliyetinin sağladığı {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusun{/g} yarısı, çatışma sonuna dek kalır. Bu bonus, kendisiyle veya Emir Sözü {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetinin{/g} sağladığı bonuslarla üst üste birikmez ancak diğer {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}becerilerin{/g} etkileri hesaplanırken {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g} kabiliyeti etkisi olarak sayılır. Not: Kalıcı Tesir'in hedefi, Emir Sözü etkisine maruz kalmış kabul edilmez. Yalnızca {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} bonus kazanır.
languages.original_text: Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by Voice of Command remains until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by Voice of Command but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects. Note: The target of Lasting Impression does not count as having the voice of command effect. They only gain bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
